This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti bust... Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., also had spoken out Friday about potential delays in the implementation of safety improvements made after the crash, saying debates about possible funding cuts shouldn't alter the timetable. We must ensure that these safety improvements happen as soon as possible, she said.
